3. Additional Utilities¶

3.1. plot_gc_bias: Plot GC bias of a BAM file¶

There is a utility for inspecting the GC bias in BAM files called plot_gc_bias.

$ ../examples/reads_gc_bias/doc_script.sh 1> /dev/null  # A script to generate a BAM file with a GC bias

(You will, of course, have noticed that the stock simple_illumina plugin has a GC bias parameter.)

$ plot_gc_bias ../examples/data/red_alga.fa.gz  ../examples/reads_gc_bias/Out/reads.bam --win 1000 --g0 0.45 --g1 0.65 --out ../examples/reads_gc_bias/Out/gc_bias.png
